text:
I know whenever we talk about our efforts in Cuba, there's a bit of mystery involved. There was an article published today about our close friend and partner who started the program, Fringe Diplomacy. If nothing else, it's a snapshot of the work he, and tangentially we, are involved in (minus the North Korea parts):

<https://www.vox.com/world/2017/7/3/15893426/negotiator-north-korea-mickey-bergman-otto-warmbier-richardson-center>

attachments.title: Meet one of the negotiators who helped free Otto Warmbier from North Korea
attachments.text: Mickey Bergman works for the Richardson Center. They fight to bring Americans back from hostile states.
attachments.fallback: Vox: Meet one of the negotiators who helped free Otto Warmbier from North Korea
